title: Right Tool | Affresh® Stainless Steel Cleaning Mousse
description:
Don't use the wrong tool for your stainless steel. Get the right tool. Affresh® Stainless Steel Cleaning Mousse gives you a confident clean with a beautiful, streak-free finish.

Whirlpool Affresh 10oz Stainless Steel Cleaning Mousse - W11042466

Features:

Specialized to clean fingerprints, smudges and residues
Eliminates overspray, dripping, and waste for direct, even coverage
Works well for general cleaning and quick touch-ups
Maintains mousse form on a cleaning towel for a smooth, non-runny application

Specifications:

10 oz Bottle
